{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ZuniDigital |model=ZR301 |revision= |upc=852796003235 |ean= |asin=B0069ABLF8 |price= |est_release_date=11/17/2011 |fcc_date=10/17/2011 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Z28-R4020A |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196C |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 MiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L3206EM2I-12G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L128168A-6B |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, internal,, pinout marked,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192CE |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=portable |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.11.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} ''300 Mbps WiFi Router + 1-Port Switch''
aka '''North Link''' / '''Zunidata''' / '''ZuniDigital''' / '''Zuni Connect''' R4020A or ZR301 (ZR301F)
[http://www.zunidigital.com/?page_id=220 Product page]
[http://www.zunidigital.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/11/ZR301-QSG.pdf Quick start guide]
[http://www.zunidigital.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/11/Users-Guide-ZR301.pdf User's Guide] "29900302-010000" is silkscreened on the small board. The power connector would appear to be a Micro-B port. Default settings are per '''ZuniDigital''''s manual. :The default SSID may be '''ZuniConnect''' (likely 58:B0:D4 OUI).
